author: shathaway
msg: Fix linkage to library from samples by editing VC10 vcxproj files

author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-284.  Upgrade to a new version of HSQLDB, which includes the hint 'USING INDEX' to tell the planner to use the order-by index if it can.  This makes HSQLDB now scalable as far as ManifoldCF is concerned.
